favourite.article: My Jesus! Has captured my heart! He has wrecked me with all He can impart! He drew me to Himself! Now I love nothing else! His beauty, love and charm won my heart!
He has made me fall in love with Him more and more each day. Lord, thank You so much for making me fall in love You more and more each day. It is the best privilege. What an incredible love!!

"And for now that I’m in love— I’ll always stay."
Singing up to this line particularly touches me every time.
I remember being introduced to this song in my home meeting by Stephen Barber.
I love You Lord.
I really like this song because we should love the Lord as much as He loves us. Thank You Lord for Your aboundant mercy.
